md:
giải nghĩa từ "cyst" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* cyst (noun) - u nang
	+ Meaning: a sac or capsule containing fluid or semi-solid material, especially in the body.
	+ Example: The doctor removed the cyst from her ovary.
	+ Related words: abscess, tumor, growth, lesion.

* cyst (verb) - hình thành u nang
	+ Meaning: to form a cyst or to become cystic.
	+ Example: The infection can cyst in the skin, causing a painful abscess.
	+ Related words: abscess, ulcerate, fester, suppurate.

Note: The verb form of "cyst" is less common and is mostly used in medical contexts.

  • cyst (verb) - hình thành u nang

    • Meaning: to form a cyst or to become cystic.
    • Example: The infection can cyst in the skin, causing a painful abscess.
    • Related words: abscess, ulcerate, fester, suppurate.

Note: The verb form of "cyst" is less common and is mostly used in medical contexts.
